title: @KateyKhaos and Champup team
body: I think Poppy, Taric and Yorick should each get a new skin when their rework hits live (similar to gp{{champion:41}} ). It's been years since these champs have recieved a new skin and think it's a bit unfair to ask their players to wait for a rework then wait yet again for a new skin.

replies.body:
Hey Sylvrd1,

As you've seen with Fiora, once a champion has been updated, they're definitely eligible for a new skin. Unfortunately, we can't guarantee a new skin will come out alongside with the champion update.

It doesn't have to come out with the update.It can come out soon after the update like with Fiora.
It's much better than having to wait a year for a new skin after waiting years for the update.
coughcoughSioncoughcough

> [{quoted}](name=Sylvrd1,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=W9O8Ja2r,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-09-01T06:53:42.625+0000)
>
> I think Poppy, Taric and Yorick should each get a new skin when their rework hits live (similar to gp{{champion:41}} ). It's been years since these champs have recieved a new skin and think it's a bit unfair to ask their players to wait for a rework then wait yet again for a new skin.

If Sion and Kassadin are any indication of future behaviors, expect at least a year-long wait for Yorick's first new skin after his relaunch.  Also, given that Urgot might become a higher priority for the team/company than Yorick (along with champions like Mordekaiser, Eve and Zilean), we could possibly see that relaunch released sometime in late 2017, which would mean a new skin for Christmas 2018.

So, we could actually see "Winter Wonder Yorick," with a snowshovel and Poro Ghouls.  Would be nice, but I really don't want to wait another three years for ChampUp to get their "special undead snowflake" finished.

(Hell, Zac might get another new skin before Yorick gets his first one.)
